title: Enhance Leap

Level 1 Transmutation Spell

Triple a creature's jumping distance.

Enhance Leap (Jump) is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Jump is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Enhance Leap Information

Description: Triple a creature's jumping distance. Level: Lvl 1 spell School: Transmutation School Casting Time: Action Range:Melee Duration: 10 turns Saving Throw: None Ritual Spell: Yes

How to Acquire Enhance Leap

Jump can be acquired by the following classes and races: Druid, Sorcerer, Wizard, Arcane Trickster, Eldritch Knight, Ranger Githyanki Jump can be cast by using the following Items: Ring of Jumping

Druid, Sorcerer, Wizard, Arcane Trickster, Eldritch Knight, Ranger Githyanki

Enhance Leap Tips & Notes

Enhance Leap is a ritual spell which can be cast without expending a spell slot outside combat. The spell provides extremely good mobility given basic jumping is already very effective.
